title: Deploy latest build to live environment

requirements.text: Trigger a build and deploy the current YAR-WAHTSAPP application to the live (publicly accessible) environment, using English for any user-facing text.
acceptanceCriteria: A build completes successfully without errors.
The deployed app is accessible in the live environment and loads the YAR-WAHTSAPP UI.
No changes are made to product features beyond deploying the current state.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; only add backend/migration.mo changes if a state upgrade is required.
nonGoals: Adding new chat features or changing existing UI/UX behavior.
Backend schema or API changes unrelated to deployment.
